data.comment: The referee blows his whistle to start the first-half. Blackburn with the kick-off.
Adam Reach scores to make it 0-1 at Ewood Park.
In the minute 45, The whistle has gone to end the first-half.
It's Sheffield Wed with the kick-off after the break.
Ben Brereton is replacing Sam Gallagher for the home team.
In the minute 62, Bradley Dack is on a sub for Lewis Holtby for Blackburn.
Blackburn make their third substitution with Stewart Downing replacing Bradley Johnson.
The away team replace Joost van Aken with Liam Shaw.
In the minute 76, Joe Rothwell levels the score at 1-1.
Blackburn's Darragh Lenihan has been booked in Blackburn.
The away team have replaced Adam Reach with Kadeem Harris. This is the second substitution made today by Tony Pulis.
In the minute 87, Isaiah Brown is on a sub for Josh Windass for Sheffield Wed.
The second-half is over. The match ends 1-1.
